sys_script.name: application_provisioning

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_9f24243c1b63ec1061858480cd4bcbcd
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sc_req_item</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sc_req_item">cat_item=76f1a4381b63ec1061858480cd4bcb8c^EQ<item display_table="sc_cat_item" display_value="Application Provisioning" endquery="false" field="cat_item" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="76f1a4381b63ec1061858480cd4bcb8c"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>application_provisioning</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current,previous/*null when async*/ ) {
			var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
			var fqdn = current.hierarchical_variables.application_name;
			var port = current.hierarchical_variables.port;
			var url = gs.getProperty("x_avx_appviewx_aut.AppViewX URL");
			var username = gs.getProperty("x_avx_appviewx_aut.Username");
			var password = gs.getProperty("x_avx_appviewx_aut.Password");
			r.setEndpoint(url+"/avxapi/visualworkflow-submit-request?gwkey=f000ca01&gwsource=web");
			r.setHttpMethod("post");
			r.setRequestHeader("username", username);
			r.setRequestHeader("password", password);
			r.setRequestHeader("Content-Type", "application/json");
			var payload = "{\"payload\":{\"data\":{\"input\":{\"requestData\":[{\"sequenceNo\":1,\"scenario\":\"scenario\",\"fieldInfo\":{\"fqdn\":\"" + fqdn + "\",\"port\":\"" + port + "\",\"name\":\"ServiceNow | " + current.number + "\"}}]},\"task_action\":1},\"header\":{\"workflowName\":\"Application Provisioning\"}}}";
			r.setRequestBody(payload);
			r.setHttpTimeout(10000);
			var response = r.executeAsync();
			var responseBody,responseMessage;
			var gr = new GlideRecord('x_avx_appviewx_aut_logs');
				gr.initialize();
				gr.level = 'Info';
				gr.script = 'application_provisioning';
				gr.application = 'AppViewX';
				gr.message = 'Triggerring request API for catalog request with number ' + current.number;
				gr.insert();
			if (response.haveError())
				{
						responseMessage = response.getErrorMessage();
						responseBody = response.getBody();
						gr.initialize();
						gr.level = 'Error';
						gr.script = 'application_provisioning';
						gr.application = 'AppViewX';
						gr.message = 'Reponse for the request with number ' + current.number + ' ' + responseBody + ' Message: ' + responseMessage ;
						gr.insert();
						current.variables.request_response = responseBody;
						current.update();

				}
			else 
				{
						responseBody = response.getBody();
						gr.initialize();
						gr.level = 'Info';
						gr.script = 'application_provisioning';
						gr.application = 'AppViewX';
						gr.message = 'Reponse for the request with number ' + current.number + responseBody ;
						gr.insert();
						current.variables.request_response = responseBody;
						current.update();
				}
				
			}		
)(current,previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-04-13 13:37:30</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>9f24243c1b63ec1061858480cd4bcbcd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>application_provisioning</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="AppViewX Automation+" source="x_avx_appviewx_aut">7165e2f81bc808502369eb1cad4bcbe0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="AppViewX Automation+">7165e2f81bc808502369eb1cad4bcbe0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9f24243c1b63ec1061858480cd4bcbcd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-04-13 13:44:56</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script></record_update>
